mapper.select: SELECT CDNO , CDLVL , UPCD , LPAD(' ', 2 * (LEVEL - 1)) || CDNAME as CDNAME , INSUSER , INSDATE , USEYN FROM CODEMNG START WITH UPCD='C0000' CONNECT BY PRIOR CDNO = UPCD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CODEMNG (CDNO, CDLVL, UPCD, CDNAME, INSUSER, INSDATE, USEYN) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT('C', LPAD(SUBSTR(MAX(CDNO), 2) + 1, 4, '0')) FROM CODEMNG), ${CDLVL}, '${UPCD}', '${CDNAME}', '${INSUSER}', SYSDATE, '${USEYN}')
mapper.select: SELECT CDNO, CDNAME FROM CODEMNG WHERE UPCD = 'C0070' START WITH UPCD='C0000' CONNECT BY PRIOR CDNO = UPCD
